code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var contentSlice=createSlice({name:'content',initialState:{component:'',data:''},reducers:{setPageContent:function setPageContent(state,action){state.component=action.payload.component;state.data=action.payload.data;}}});var setPageContent=contentSlice.actions.setPageContent;export{setPageContent};export var getPageContent=function getPageContent(state){return state;};export default contentSlice.reducer;
